name: zaneops
description: zane-ops is a self-hosted operations dashboard for monitoring services and deployments. It aggregates status, logs, and metrics into a unified web interface for small teams or homelabs.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Collect and search logs from multiple services in a centralized interface with filtering

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize resource usage, request rates, and performance metrics for all monitored services

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up notifications for service failures, performance degradation, or deployment issues

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Monitor Docker containers and orchestration platforms with detailed resource metrics
